cacar.probabilities:
Hunt probabilities

Demons: `[{{demon}}]`
Giants: `[{{giant}}]`
Angels: `[{{angel}}]`
Archangels: `[{{archangel}}]`
Demigods: `[{{demi}}]`
Gods: `[{{god}}]`
cacar.no-args: you must choose between hunting demons, angels, demigods and gods
cacar.help:
** HOW DOES HUNTING WORK? ** 
You can hunt every hour, and you can choose from 4 hunts: `demons`, `angels`,` demigods` and `gods` 
The farther to the right, the more valuable, but also, more difficult to hunt, and less chance of success 
On my support server, the chances of hunting are greater!
cacar.footer: Did you know that on my support server, your chances of success are greater?
cacar.description_start: You went hunting **{{hunt}}** **{{count}}** time with Super Xand√£o, and you returned home with more **{{value}}** to count. You are in **#{{rank}}** on the {{hunt}} top
cacar.description_start_plural: You went hunting **{{hunt}}** **{{count}}** times with Super Xand√£o, and you returned home with more **{{value}}** to count. You are in **#{{rank}}** on the {{hunt}} top
cacar.god_hunted_success: HOLLY MOLLY!!! YOU BECOME A HERO FRUIT OF A DIVINE FORCE, AS WELL AS XAND√ÉO, AND GOT ‚Äã‚ÄãHUNTING `{{count}}` GOD IN **{{toRun}}** TRIES! WITH THAT SAID, YOU ARE IN **#{{rank}}** ON GOD MENHERA'S TOP
cacar.god_hunted_success_plural: HOLLY MOLLY!!! YOU BECOME A HERO FRUIT OF A DIVINE FORCE, AS WELL AS XAND√ÉO, AND GOT ‚Äã‚ÄãHUNTING `{{count}}` GODS IN **{{toRun}}** TRIES! WITH THAT SAID, YOU ARE IN **#{{rank}}** ON GOD MENHERA'S TOP
cacar.god_hunted_fail: Hunting Gods is an extremely difficult mission, and in **{{count}}** try you have not been successful. But rest assured, hero, you can still do it! You are in **{{rank}}** on god's top
cacar.god_hunted_fail_plural: Hunting Gods is an extremely difficult mission, and in **{{count}}** tries you have not been successful. But rest assured, hero, you can still do it! You are in **{{rank}}** on god's top

botinfo.embed_description:
Hi my name is **{{name}}**, and I'm a Brazilian Bot for Discord with a focus on fun and RPG! I was created in **{{createdAt}}** and joined this server in **{{joinedAt}}**.

A little bit about me: My name is Menhera, I am 16 years old and I LOVE, I mean, I LOOOOVE to use these faces: (>...<). To learn more, go to my [twitter](https://twitter.com/__MenheraBot), my [support server](https://discord.gg/fZMdQbA) and my [WEBSITE](https://menherabot.xyz).
